Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Eugene>、その三つ編み、 上手いわね。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, <Eugene>, your braid is impeccable.

Entry.JapaneseText: これか……伸ばす事を決めた時に、 とある人から教わった。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, this... When I decided to grow my hair out, someone taught me how to braid it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 公式な場でボサボサというわけにもいかないし、 戦いにおいても具合が悪い。
Entry.EnglishText: I couldn't have messy hair at official functions, and it would be cumbersome in battle as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 編むのに時間はかかるが…… まあ、みだしなみというやつだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Braiding it does take a while, but... Well, that's what it means to keep up one's appearance.
